named-query.name: getItemsByName
named-query.query: select i from Item i where i.name = :itemName

named-query.name: getItemsByNameSubstring
named-query.query: select i from Item i where lower(i.name) like lower(:itemName)

named-query.name: getItemBidSummaries
named-query.query: select new org.jpwh.model.ItemBidSummary( i.id, i.name, i.auctionEnd, max(b.amount) ) from Bid b right outer join b.item i group by i.id, i.name, i.auctionEnd order by i.auctionEnd asc
